page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT IN E.CORNWALL
page.content: In this area,farm work has been the main occupation.With modern agricultural practices,many jobs have been lost and opportunities reduced.The sale of Duchy properties, and the vogue for converting barns into h0uses,however, has led to an increase in building trades which has absorbed some school leavers and offered skilled older men wih crafts in stone building and slating both employment and the chance to become self-employed.Newcomers buying property are.in some cases,creating workshops in furniture making,metal and leather working. R.DINGLE & SONS Contractors,employ 25 men.The company celebrated it's centenary in 1985. F.G.MARQUAND &SONS own a wholesale fruit and vegetable business.They employ 16 men.
